productName: Apple - Apple Watch Series 3 (GPS) 38mm Silver Aluminum Case with White Sport Band - Silver Aluminum
description: Low and high heart rate notifications. Emergency SOS. New Breathe watch faces. Automatic workout detection. New yoga and hiking workouts. Advanced features for runners like cadence and pace alerts. New head-to-head competitions. Apple Watch Series 3 lets you do it all right from your wrist.
